document_data.name: Arctic Fox
document_data.mainbody: '''Arctic foxes''' were a small mammal related to the [[fox]].
document_data.Abilities: Arctic foxes had a keen sense of smell. They were capable of detecting another creatures scent over a distance of up to {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}}. Its white fur provided blended in with the snow and ice of the tundra.
document_data.Behavior: Arctic foxes, like their cousins, were cunning creatures.{{Cite dragon/280/A Little More Familiar|61}}
document_data.Combat: When faced with a larger opponents, arctic foxes fled instead of standing their ground.
document_data.Ecology: Arctic foxes lived alone or in mating pairs. They were found in cold plains and tundra. and the [[High Ice]].
document_data.Uses: The pelt of the arctic fox was used as clothing by the [[frost folk]].
